title: Internals Postponed
content: Second internals for 4 and 6 sem students have been postponed to 05-07-2024.

title: Seminar on Web3
content:
Dear students,
Everyone must attend the talk on Web3 given by Dr. Anjali D.
Attendance is mandatory.

title: Walkathon organised for Mens Mental health.
content:
A walkathon is organised by the CSE dept on 5th of july to spead awareness on men's mental health.
Activity points will be provided.

title: Hackathon organised
content:
GDSC BIT is organising 'amBITion 2024', a national level hackathon on 6 and 7 July.
Please particiate and make the event a success.
